creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Dr Hashimoto, Wakayama
description: one vertical line of cursive calligraphy on pale purple paper decorated with two bands of gold flakes, as well as a few pink, green, and white spots
